name: Loyc Core
body:
### Web site in progress

This will be the home page of the Loyc Core Libraries, a set of useful libraries for many kinds of .NET developers, with a special focus on collection classes, interfaces, adapters, and extension methods.

- Loyc.Essentials fills in gaps in the .NET Base Class Library
- Loyc.Collections adds sophisticated data structures-
- Loyc.Syntax contains the LES parser and other parsing-related services including base classes for [LLLPG](http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/664785/A-New-Parser-Generator-for-Csharp).

### Links

- Visit the [repository](https://github.com/qwertie/LoycCore/wiki)
- Visit the [Wiki](https://github.com/qwertie/LoycCore/wiki)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
